19/  I will never promise you anything that I cannot achieve. First we need to build our budget and then we can board the space flight to the Moon.

18/ We will together finish our charity sponsoring process and in the end, original Art will prevail. NFTs are about Art and entertainment, and this is what we will achieve. All together.

The next steps in the Pigeon flight will be quite exciting.

17/ And that, was finally the start of the adventure. You guys are all part of the adventure now. This has now become YOUR project. You are all shareholders and together, we will carry on proving to the NFT Space that their approach has become completely wrong.

16/ So a couple of days ago, we launched. Again.
We sold about 4.5k in the first 3 days. I had no idea that @Monster and @3hippies had even tweeted about it!! But when I found out, half a day later, 5k NFTs were minted in 56 minutes (to be exact).
